title: Drop-Off
description: Please try to avoid dropping off in the Visitor Parking Lot at the back of UHS. It's best to drop off at the side of the school facing Shaw.

title: All-Strings Concert
description: The All-Strings Concert will be at the Paul Shaghoian Concert Hall on April 25th, from 7:00 - 8:30 PM. If you would like to purchase tickets, please go to the Front Office. All of the String Ensemble groups with the exception of Symphony Orchestra will be performing at this concert. If you have any questions, please see  Dr. Cornelison.

title: All-Choirs Concert
description: The All-Choirs Concert will be at the Paul Shaghoian Concert Hall on April 26th, from 7:00 - 8:30 PM. If you would like to purchase tickets, please go to the Front Office. All of the Choirs will be performing at this concert. If you have any questions, please see  Dr. Moore.
